title: [New API][World Editor]新版创世神插件
author: wangyibo1997
txt_content:
本帖最后由 wangyibo1997 于 2015-1-3 21:57 编辑 

在Github上找到的創世神插件
還是和原來的一樣的功能
不過已經支持了新的API
大家快去下載吧
百度云下载地址:http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=970842351&uk=2435435554
                                                                                 用法如下CommandParametersDescription//limit<limit>Set a maximum number of blocks to change at most for all operations. This only affects yourself. Use this to prevent catastrophic accidents.//wandGives you the "edit wand". Break a block with this tool to select position 1 and touch a block to selection position 2.//pos1Set selection position #1 to the block above the one that you are standing on.//pos2Set selection position #2 to the block above the one that you are standing on.//set<blocks>Set all blocks inside the selection region to a specified block(s).//replace<from-block> <to-block>Replace all blocks of the specified block with another block(s) inside the region.//copyCopies the currently selected region. Be aware that it stores your position relative to the selection when copying.//cutCuts the currently selected region.//pastePastes the clipboard.//sphere<blocks> <radius>Create a sphere.//hsphere<blocks> <radius>Create a hollow sphere.//deselDeselects the current selection./toggleeditwandToggles the edit wand selection mode, allowing you to use the edit wand item normally.
